  <link as="style" href="https://cross-frontend.cdn.lexipol.com/static/894/policeone/css/homepage.css" onload="this.onload=null;this.rel='stylesheet'" rel="preload"/>
  <noscript>
   <link href="https://cross-frontend.cdn.lexipol.com/static/894/policeone/css/homepage.css" rel="stylesheet"/>
  </noscript>
  <script crossorigin="anonymous" data-lazy="no" src="https://js.sentry-cdn.com/ca0147b59f9f46d9bac27e7727ef0ca6.min.js">
  </script>
  <script crossorigin="anonymous" id="js-sentry_dedupe" src="https://browser.sentry-cdn.com/5.13.2/dedupe.min.js">
  </script>
  <script>
   (function () {
      var loaded = false;
      try {
        if (eval('Sentry.Integrations.Dedupe')) { loaded = true; } 
      } catch (e) {}
      if (!loaded) {
        var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
        var error = null;
          
        xhr.open('GET', 'https://browser.sentry-cdn.com/5.13.2/dedupe.min.js', false);
        try {
          xhr.send();
          if (xhr.status < 200 || xhr.status >= 400) {
            error = xhr;
          }
        } catch (e) {
          error = e;
        }
        if (error) {
          Sentry.configureScope(function (scope) {
            try {
              scope.setExtra('sentry_dedupe_headers', {
                'x-hw': xhr.getResponseHeader('x-hw'),
              });
            } catch (ex1) {}

            scope.setTag('sentry_dedupe_loaded', false);
            scope.setExtra('sentry_dedupe_error', error);
          });
          return;
        }
        eval(xhr.responseText);
      }
    })();
  </script>
  <script>
   /*! loadCSS rel=preload polyfill. [c]2017 Filament Group, Inc. MIT License */
    !function(t){"use strict";t.loadCSS||(t.loadCSS=function(){});var e=loadCSS.relpreload={};if(e.support=function(){var e;try{e=t.document.createElement("link").relList.supports("preload")}catch(t){e=!1}return function(){return e}}(),e.bindMediaToggle=function(t){function e(){t.media=a}var a=t.media||"all";t.addEventListener?t.addEventListener("load",e):t.attachEvent&&t.attachEvent("onload",e),setTimeout(function(){t.rel="stylesheet",t.media="only x"}),setTimeout(e,3e3)},e.poly=function(){if(!e.support())for(var a=t.document.getElementsByTagName("link"),n=0;n<a.length;n++){var o=a[n];"preload"!==o.rel||"style"!==o.getAttribute("as")||o.getAttribute("data-loadcss")||(o.setAttribute("data-loadcss",!0),e.bindMediaToggle(o))}},!e.support()){e.poly();var a=t.setInterval(e.poly,500);t.addEventListener?t.addEventListener("load",function(){e.poly(),t.clearInterval(a)}):t.attachEvent&&t.attachEvent("onload",function(){e.poly(),t.clearInterval(a)})}"undefined"!=typeof exports?exports.loadCSS=loadCSS:t.loadCSS=loadCSS}("undefined"!=typeof global?global:this);
  </script>
  <script>
   var siteSettings = {
      isStagingOrLocal: false,
      cubPublicKey: 'pk_5oWZvB1GVwxWcbmGq',
      lidCdnDomain: 'lid.cdn.lexipol.com',
      userIp: '76.247.181.241',
      sentryUrlFrontEnd: '',
      sentryRelease: 'media-frontend@894',
      cubCustomMenuItems: true,
      headerNewEnabled: true,
      searchApiUrl: '/api/search/v1/',
      trackingLinkUrl: 'https://go.lexipol.com',
      userUid: '',
    };
    var sendLyticsDataEnabled = true;
  </script>
  <script>
   (function () {
    var botUARegexps = [
      /Mediapartners\-Google/,
      /AdsBot\-Google/,
      /Googlebot/,
      /FeedFetcher\-Google/,
      /BingBot/,
      /BingPreview/,
      /Baiduspide/,
      /Slurp/,
      /Sogou/,
      /facebook/,
      /ia_archive/,
      /bots?[\/\s\)\;]/,
      /spider[\/\s\)\;]/,
      /Slack/,
      /Calypso AppCrawle/,
      /pingdom/,
      /lyticsbot/
    ];
    var botsIP = [
      
      ['64.68.90.1', '64.68.90.255'],
      ['64.233.173.193', '64.233.173.255'],
      ['66.249.64.1', '66.249.79.255'],
      ['216.239.33.96', '216.239.59.128'],
      
      ['66.220.144.0', '66.220.159.255'],
      ['69.171.224.0', '69.171.255.255'],
      ['173.252.64.0', '173.252.127.255'],
      ['31.13.64.0', '31.13.127.255']
    ];

    var statsQs = '?js=1';
    
    var statsAnchors = 1;

    function checkIpRanges(ip) {
      function ipToNumber(ipAddr) {
        return ipAddr.split('.').reduce(function (prev, segment, i) {
          return prev + (Number(segment) << 8 * (4 - i - 1));
        }, 0);
      }
      var ipNumeric = ipToNumber(ip);
      for (var i = 0; i < botsIP.length; i++) {
        var range = botsIP[i];
        if (typeof range === 'string' && ip === range) { return true; }
        var startIp = ipToNumber(range[0]);
        var endIp = ipToNumber(range[1]);
        if (ipNumeric >= startIp && ipNumeric <= endIp) { return true; }
      }
      return false;
    }

    
    if (
      botUARegexps.some(function (el) { return el.test(navigator.userAgent); }) ||
      window.siteSettings && siteSettings.userIp && checkIpRanges(siteSettings.userIp)
    ) {
      return;
    }
    
    function statsRequestCheck(url, param) {
      var xhrga = new XMLHttpRequest();
      statsAnchors++;
      xhrga.open('GET', url);
      xhrga.onabort = function () { checkAndFireStats(param + '=0'); };
      xhrga.onerror = function () { checkAndFireStats(param + '=0'); };
      xhrga.onload = function () { checkAndFireStats(param + '=1'); };
      try {
        xhrga.send();
      } catch (e) {
        if (e && e.message.search('Unexpected call to method or property access') !== -1) {
          return;
        }
        Sentry.captureException(e);
      }
    }

    function fetchCheck(url, param){
      statsAnchors++;
      if (!window.Request || !window.fetch) {
        checkAndFireStats(param + '=unknown');
        return;
      }
      var myRequest = new Request(url, { method: 'HEAD', mode: 'no-cors' });
      fetch(myRequest).then(function(response) { return response; })
        .then(function(response) {
          checkAndFireStats(param + '=1');
        }).catch(function(e){
          checkAndFireStats(param + '=0');
        });
    }
    
    function fireStats () {
      var url = '/stats' + statsQs;
      var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
      xhr.open('GET', url);
      xhr.onerror = function () {}
      xhr.onload = function () { console.log(url); };
      xhr.send();
      console.log(url);
    }
    window.needsAsyncStats = function () { statsAnchors += 1; };
    window.checkAndFireStats = function (param) {
      statsAnchors -= 1;
      if (param) { statsQs += '&' + param; }
      if (statsAnchors <= 0) { fireStats(); }
    };

    
    statsRequestCheck('https://www.google-analytics.com/collect', 'ga');
    
    
    fetchCheck('https://googleads.g.doubleclick.net/pagead/id', 'ads_request');

    
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
      statsQs += '&sentry=' + (!!window.Sentry ? '1' : '0');
      statsQs += '&head_sync=' + (!!window.mediaUtils ? '1' : '0');
      statsQs += '&sentry_config=' + (!!window.hasSentryInited ? '1' : '0');
      statsQs += '&ads_script=' + (!!window.AdBlockDisabled ? '1' : '0');
      checkAndFireStats();
    });
  })();
  </script>
  <script id="js_head_sync">
   !function(e){var t={};function n(o){if(t[o])return t[o].exports;var i=t[o]={i:o,l:!1,exports:{}};return e[o].call(i.exports,i,i.exports,n),i.l=!0,i.exports}n.m=e,n.c=t,n.d=function(e,t,o){n.o(e,t)||Object.defineProperty(e,t,{enumerable:!0,get:o})},n.r=function(e){"undefined"!=typeof Symbol&&Symbol.toStringTag&&Object.defineProperty(e,Symbol.toStringTag,{value:"Module"}),Object.defineProperty(e,"__esModule",{value:!0})},n.t=function(e,t){if(1&t&&(e=n(e)),8&t)return e;if(4&t&&"object"==typeof e&&e&&e.__esModule)return e;var o=Object.create(null);if(n.r(o),Object.defineProperty(o,"default",{enumerable:!0,value:e}),2&t&&"string"!=typeof e)for(var i in   <script>
   function getDeviceType(){
  var a=navigator.userAgent||navigator.vendor||window.opera;
  if (/(android|bb\d+|meego).+mobile|avantgo|bada\/|blazer|compal|elaine|fennec|hiptop|iemobile|ip(hone|od)|iris|kindle|lge |maemo|midp|mmp|mobile.+firefox|netfront|opera m(ob|in)i|palm( os)?|phone|p(ixi|re)\/|plucker|pocket|psp|series(4|6)0|symbian|treo|up\.(browser|link)|vodafone|wap|windows ce|xda|xiino/i.test(a) ||
    /blackberry|bb10/i.test(a) && !/tablet/.test(a) ||
    /windows.+phone/i.test(a) ||
    /1207|6310|6590|3gso|4thp|50[1-6]i|770s|802s|a wa|abac|ac(er|oo|s\-)|ai(ko|rn)|al(av|ca|co)|amoi|an(ex|ny|yw)|aptu|ar(ch|go)|as(te|us)|attw|au(di|\-m|r |s )|avan|be(ck|ll|nq)|bi(lb|rd)|bl(ac|az)|br(e|v)w|bumb|bw\-(n|u)|c55\/|capi|ccwa|cdm\-|cell|chtm|cldc|cmd\-|co(mp|nd)|craw|da(it|ll|ng)|dbte|dc\-s|devi|dica|dmob|do(c|p)o|ds(12|\-d)|el(49|ai)|em(l2|ul)|er(ic|k0)|esl8|ez([4-7]0|os|wa|ze)|fetc|fly(\-|_)|g1 u|g560|gene|gf\-5|g\-mo|go(\.w|od)|gr(ad|un)|haie|hcit|hd\-(m|p|t)|hei\-|hi(pt|ta)|hp( i|ip)|hs\-c|ht(c(\-| |_|a|g|p|s|t)|tp)|hu(aw|tc)|i\-(20|go|ma)|i230|iac( |\-|\/)|ibro|idea|ig01|ikom|im1k|inno|ipaq|iris|ja(t|v)a|jbro|jemu|jigs|kddi|keji|kgt( |\/)|klon|kpt |kwc\-|kyo(c|k)|le(no|xi)|lg( g|\/(k|l|u)|50|54|\-[a-w])|libw|lynx|m1\-w|m3ga|m50\/|ma(te|ui|xo)|mc(01|21|ca)|m\-cr|me(rc|ri)|mi(o8|oa|ts)|mmef|mo(01|02|bi|de|do|t(\-| |o|v)|zz)|mt(50|p1|v )|mwbp|mywa|n10[0-2]|n20[2-3]|n30(0|2)|n50(0|2|5)|n7(0(0|1)|10)|ne((c|m)\-|on|tf|wf|wg|wt)|nok(6|i)|nzph|o2im|op(ti|wv)|oran|owg1|p800|pan(a|d|t)|pdxg|pg(13|\-([1-8]|c))|phil|pire|pl(ay|uc)|pn\-2|po(ck|rt|se)|prox|psio|pt\-g|qa\-a|qc(07|12|21|32|60|\-[2-7]|i\-)|qtek|r380|r600|raks|rim9|ro(ve|zo)|s55\/|sa(ge|ma|mm|ms|ny|va)|sc(01|h\-|oo|p\-)|sdk\/|se(c(\-|0|1)|47|mc|nd|ri)|sgh\-|shar|sie(\-|m)|sk\-0|sl(45|id)|sm(al|ar|b3|it|t5)|so(ft|ny)|sp(01|h\-|v\-|v )|sy(01|mb)|t2(18|50)|t6(00|10|18)|ta(gt|lk)|tcl\-|tdg\-|tel(i|m)|tim\-|t\-mo|to(pl|sh)|ts(70|m\-|m3|m5)|tx\-9|up(\.b|g1|si)|utst|v400|v750|veri|vi(rg|te)|vk(40|5[0-3]|\-v)|vm40|voda|vulc|vx(52|53|60|61|70|80|81|83|85|98)|w3c(\-| )|webc|whit|wi(g |nc|nw)|wmlb|wonu|x700|yas\-|your|zeto|zte\-/i.test(a.substr(0,4))){return 'mobile'}
  if(/tablet|ipad|playbook|silk/i.test(a) ||
    // iPad iOS 13+
    navigator.platform === 'MacIntel' && navigator.maxTouchPoints > 1 ||
    /blackberry|bb10/i.test(a) ||
    /windows.+touch/i.test(a) && !/phone/i.test(a)){return 'tablet'}
  if((function() {
    var television = ['googletv','viera','smarttv','internet.tv','netcast','nettv','appletv','boxee','kylo','roku','dlnadoc','pov_tv','hbbtv','ce-html'];
    var i = 0
    while (i < television.length) {
      if(a.search((television[i]))!=-1) {return true}
      i++
    }
    return false
  })()){return 'tv'}
  return 'desktop';
}
  </script>
  <script>
   (function () {
      var _dataLayer = {"visitorState": "Not logged in", "Device": "", "gaProperty": "UA-3782594-10", "section": "Home"};
      try {
        _dataLayer['Device'] = getDeviceType();
      } catch (e) {
        _dataLayer['Device'] = 'unknown';
        Sentry.captureException(e);
      }
      window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
      window.dataLayer.push(_dataLayer);
    })();
  </script>
  <script>
   // lytics callback initializer
  !function (l, a) { a.liosetup = a.liosetup || {}, a.liosetup.callback = a.liosetup.callback || [], a.liosetup.addEntityLoadedCallback = function (l, o) { if ("function" == typeof a.liosetup.callback) { var i = []; i.push(a.liosetup.callback), a.liosetup.callback = i } a.lio && a.lio.loaded ? l(a.lio.data) : o ? a.liosetup.callback.unshift(l) : a.liosetup.callback.push(l) } }(document, window);

  // lytics custom dfp integration that does not auto refresh ads
  (function (d, w) {
    w.liosetup.addEntityLoadedCallback(function (data) {
      // initialize googletag
      w.googletag = w.googletag || {};
      w.googletag.cmd = w.googletag.cmd || [];
      if ("undefined" != typeof w.googletag) {
        w.googletag.cmd.push(function () {
          w.googletag.pubads().disableInitialLoad()
        })
      } else {
        (w.console && w.console.warn) && w.console.warn("attempting to load Lytics for DFP before initializing googletag");
      }

      if (data && data.segments) {
        w.googletag.cmd.push(function () {
          w.googletag.pubads().setTargeting("LyticsSegments", data.segments);
        });
      } else {
        (w.console && w.console.warn) && w.console.warn('unable to load Lytics audiences for DFP')
      }
    });
  }(document, window));
  </script>

window[v]?p[v]=window[v].toString():p[v]="function"}catch(e){}}r.extra.window=p}return(/Sentry.Integrations.Dedupe is not a constructor/.test(l)||/undefined is not a constructor (evaluating 'new Sentry.Integrations.Dedupe')/.test(l))&&(r.fingerprint=["Type: TypeError","Message: Sentry.Integrations.Dedupe is not a constructor"]),(/'DetectDeviceHelper' is undefined/.test(l)||/DetectDeviceHelper is not defined/.test(l))&&(r.fingerprint=["Type: TypeError","Message: DetectDeviceHelper is not defined"]),/^undefined$/.test(l)||(/NotFoundError/.test(l)||/Failed to execute 'removeChild' on 'Node'/.test(l))&&a(n,{filename:"lio.js"},r)||/Failed to execute 'replaceChild'/.test(l)&&a(n,{func:"players.brightcove.net"},r)||/%0D/.test(l)||/\)$/.test(l)?null:r}Sentry.onLoad((function(){var e={release:siteSettings.sentryRelease||void 0,integrations:[new Sentry.Integrations.InboundFilters({whitelistUrls:[/police1\.com/,/firerescue1\.com/,/ems1\.com/,/corrections1\.com/,/gov1\.com/,/firechief\.com/,/policegrantshelp\.com/,/firegrantshelp\.com/,/emsgrantshelp\.com/,/govgrantshelp\.com/,/educationgrantshelp\.com/,/correctionsonegrants\.com/,/praetorian\.netdna-ssl\.com/,/lexipol\.com/,/efficientgov\.com/,/policeone\.com/,/correctionsone\.com/],blacklistUrls:[],ignoreErrors:i})],beforeSend:s};Sentry.Integrations.Dedupe&&e.integrations.push(new Sentry.Integrations.Dedupe),Sentry.configureScope((function(e){e.setTag("has_dedupe",!!Sentry.Integrations.Dedupe)})),Sentry.init(e)})),Sentry.configureScope((function(e){e.setTag("has_adblock",!window.AdBlockDisabled),e.setTag("has_googletag",!!window.googletag),e.setTag("has_lytics",!(!window.lio&&!window.liosetup)),e.setTag("has_lazyads",!(!window.lazyAds||!window.lazyAds.ready)),e.setTag("has_cubUser",!!function(e,t){if(void 0===e)return!1;var n=new RegExp("(?:^|;)(?:\\s)*".concat(e,"=(.*?)(?:;|$)")),r=document.cookie.match(n);return!!r&&(void 0!==t?r[1]===t.toString():""!==r[1]&&r[1])}("cubUserToken")),e.setExtra("webfeautres",!!window.webFeatures),e.setExtra("mediaDevices",!!navigator.mediaDevices)})),window.hasSentryInited=!0},14:function(e,t){function n(t){return"function"==typeof Symbol&&"symbol"==typeof Symbol.iterator?e.exports=n=function(e){return typeof e}:e.exports=n=function(e){return e&&"function"==typeof Symbol&&e.constructor===Symbol&&e!==Symbol.prototype?"symbol":typeof e},n(t)}e.exports=n}});
//# sourceMappingURL=https://cross-frontend.cdn.lexipol.com/static/894/policeone/js/sentry-init.js.map
  </script>
  <script crossorigin="anonymous" src="https://cross-frontend.cdn.lexipol.com/static/894/policeone/js/dfp.js">
  </script>
  <script>
   if (window.needsAsyncStats) { needsAsyncStats(); }
    function err_head() {
      var script = document.createElement('script');
      
      script.defer = true;
      script.onload = function () {
        if (window.checkAndFireStats) { checkAndFireStats('head=1'); }
      }
      script.onerror = script.oneabort = function () {
        if (window.checkAndFireStats) { checkAndFireStats('head=0'); }
        Sentry.configureScope(function (scope) {
          scope.setTag('head_loaded', false);
        });
      }
      script.src = 'https://cross-frontend.cdn.lexipol.com/static/894/policeone/js/head.js';
      document.head.appendChild(script);
    }
    function load_head() {
      if (window.checkAndFireStats) { checkAndFireStats('head=1'); }
    }
  </script>
  <script crossorigin="anonymous" defer="" id="js-head" onerror="err_head()" onload="load_head()" src="https://cross-frontend.cdn.lexipol.com/static/894/policeone/js/head.js">
  </script>
  <script crossorigin="anonymous" defer="" src="https://cross-frontend.cdn.lexipol.com/static/894/policeone/js/search.js">
  </script>
  <script class="_iub_cs_activate" data-iub-purposes="4" type="text/plain">
   (function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!=='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
'//www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
})(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-MSVGX2');
  </script>

  <div class="Page" data-page-bg="">
   <div class="Page-inner">
    <div class="Container">
     <div class="Columns Columns--meta">
      <span class="Columns-content">
       <h1 class="Columns-metaItem">
        The One Resource for Police Officers and Law Enforcement
       </h1>
      </span>
      <div class="Columns-sidebar">
       <a data-target="#modal-set-homepage" data-toggle="modal" href="#">
        Make Police1 Your Homepage
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="Columns">
      <div class="Columns-content u-visiblePrintScope">
       <div class="Section Section--gapVertL">
        <div class="Box u-noPadding">
         <div class="Grid Grid--2sm Grid--plainOnPrint">
          <div class="Grid-item u-hiddenPrint">
           <div class="Slider Slider--imgProportion" data-carousel-name="Featured Articles Slider" data-owl-carousel="single-with-pager" data-owl-item-class="Slider-item" data-owl-pagination="#breaking-news-pager">
            <div class="Slider-itemsContainer">
             <div class="Slider-item">
              <a class="Slider-itemBg" data-i="1" href="/officer-safety/articles/police-chief-says-miami-partying-couldnt-go-on-any-longer-k2cRXc7g3AchJzyo/">

                <span class="Picture Picture--stretch" style="width:5086px;">
                 <picture class="Picture-pic" style="padding-top:88.08%;">

                     <source media="(max-width: 599px)" srcset="https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=960&amp;h=530&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=80&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 3x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=960&amp;h=530&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=70&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 2x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=720&amp;h=397&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=70&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 1.5x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=480&amp;h=265&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=87&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 1x">
                      <source media="(max-width: 700px)" srcset="https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=1160&amp;h=530&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=80&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 3x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=1160&amp;h=530&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=70&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 2x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=870&amp;h=397&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=70&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 1.5x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=580&amp;h=265&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=87&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 1x">
                       <source media="(max-width: 767px)" srcset="https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=1440&amp;h=530&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=80&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 3x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=1440&amp;h=530&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=70&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 2x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=1080&amp;h=397&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=70&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 1.5x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=720&amp;h=265&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=87&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 1x">
                        <source media="(max-width: 1023px)" srcset="https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=708&amp;h=530&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=80&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 3x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=708&amp;h=530&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=70&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 2x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=531&amp;h=397&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=70&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 1.5x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=354&amp;h=265&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=87&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 1x">
                         <source media="(max-width: 1219px)" srcset="https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=600&amp;h=530&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=80&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 3x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=600&amp;h=530&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=70&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 2x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=450&amp;h=397&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=70&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 1.5x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/AP21081402325236.jpg?w=300&amp;h=265&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=87&amp;crop=0%2C1513%2C5086%2C4480 1x">

                          </source>
                         </source>
                        </source>
                       </source>
                      </source>
                     </source>
                    </source>
                   </source>
                  </source>
                 </picture>
                </span>
               </div>
              </a>
              <div class="Slider-itemContent">
               <div class="Card Card--featured">
                <a class="Card-imgTitleWrap" href="/officer-safety/articles/police-chief-says-miami-partying-couldnt-go-on-any-longer-k2cRXc7g3AchJzyo/">
                 <div class="Card-title">
                  <h3 class="Card-titleText">
                   Police chief says Miami partying "couldn't go on any longer"
                  </h3>
                 </div>
                </a>
                <p class="Card-subtitle">
                 After over 1,000 arrests, Miami Beach officials have imposed a curfew that could extend through the end of spring break
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="Slider-item">
              <a class="Slider-itemBg" data-i="2" href="/legal/articles/inventory-policy-violation-leads-to-suppression-of-gun-jyuXbvE8qBKk8QBU/">
               <div class="Slider-img">
                <span class="Picture Picture--stretch" style="width:808px;">
                 <picture class="Picture-pic" style="padding-top:88.0%;">
                  <source data-srcset="https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/Improper-Application-of-Inventory-Doctrine.jpg?w=600&amp;h=530&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=87&amp;crop=0%2C496%2C808%2C711 3x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/Improper-Application-of-Inventory-Doctrine.jpg?w=600&amp;h=530&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=87&amp;crop=0%2C496%2C808%2C711 2x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/Improper-Application-of-Inventory-Doctrine.jpg?w=450&amp;h=397&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=87&amp;crop=0%2C496%2C808%2C711 1.5x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/article-images/Improper-Application-of-Inventory-Doctrine.jpg?w=300&amp;h=265&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=87&amp;crop=0%2C496%2C808%2C711 1x" media="(max-width: 359px)">

                   Inventory policy violation leads to suppression of gun

                 </div>

                <p class="Card-subtitle">
                 One can easily relate to the deputiesâ€™ desire to seize the gun after a short, dangerous pursuit

                 <div class="Card-title">
                  <h3 class="Card-titleText">
                   Spa shootings could be first test of Ga. hate crimes law
                  </h3>
                 </div>

                 Georgia was one of only four states without a hate crimes law when lawmakers passed it last year

       <div class="Section Section--gapVertL">
        <div class="Grid Grid--2sm Grid--plainOnPrint">
         <div class="Grid-item">
          <div class="Section Section--gapVertL">
           <h2 class="TitleBar u-noMargin is-lazyLoad">
            Product Zone
           </h2>
           <div class="Tabs" data-tabs="">
            <ul class="Tabs-nav">
             <li class="Tabs-navItem is-active" data-tabs-nav="#products-hot">
              Whatâ€™s hot
             </li>

            <div class="Tabs-contentPane is-active" data-tabs-tab="" id="products-hot">
             <div class="Section">
              <div class="Section-block">
               <div class="HCard HCard--imgXS HCard--pseudoArticle">
                <a class="HCard-imgTitleWrap" data-js-hover="" href="https://go.lexipol.com/?target=whh_76u0qVTZn5C7h2mx&amp;source=ads_uqmPSV30mfT8Mowi" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
                 <h3 class="HCard-title u-block">
                  How to Buy WMD-Detection Equipment (eBook)
                 </h3>
                 <div class="HCard-imgBlock">
                  <span class="Picture" style="width:130px;">
                   <picture class="Picture-pic" style="padding-top:100.0%;">
                    <source data-srcset="https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/product-images/p1-wmd-detection.jpg?w=200&amp;h=300&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=91&amp;crop=0%2C0%2C130%2C130 3x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/product-images/p1-wmd-detection.jpg?w=200&amp;h=300&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=91&amp;crop=0%2C0%2C130%2C130 2x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/product-images/p1-wmd-detection.jpg?w=150&amp;h=225&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=91&amp;crop=0%2C0%2C130%2C130 1.5x,https://media.cdn.lexipol.com/product-images/p1-wmd-detection.jpg?w=100&amp;h=150&amp;mode=max&amp;format=jpg&amp;quality=91&amp;crop=0%2C0%2C130%2C130 1x">

                    </source>
                   </picture>
                  </span>
                 </div>
                </a>
                <div class="HCard-textsWrap">

                 </p>

           <h2 class="TitleBar TitleBar--knowledge">
            <img alt="Lexipol" class="TitleBar-logo TitleBar-logo--svg is-lazyLoad" src="https://cross-frontend.cdn.lexipol.com/static/894/policeone/images/logos/lexipol-white.svg" style="width: 78px; height: 16px;font-size: 0"/>

             KNOWLEDGE BASE
            </span>
           </h2>
           <ul class="List List--noMarker">
            <li class="List-item">
             <div class="HCard HCard--imgS">
              <a class="HCard-imgTitleWrap" data-tracking-link="https://go.lexipol.com/?target=art_lBy6dKUN2MXo3EnQ&amp;source=ads_jf5TMm0HP2Kql93t&amp;site=policeone" href="https://info.lexipol.com/webinar-law-enforcement-roadway-safety-p1-hp-block" rel="noopener noreferer" target="_blank">

                <div class="Card-title">
                 <h3 class="Card-titleText">
                  School safety training for children

                <div class="Card-title">
                 <h3 class="Card-titleText">
                  The 5 tenets of Below 100
                 </h3>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
           <p>
            <a class="Link" href="/videos/originals/">
             Watch more Police1
             <span class="Link-lastWord">
              videos
             </span>

            <div class="Card-text">
             <p class="Card-subtitle u-textCaseUpper u-textBold u-textColorSpecial">
              Cradlepoint
             </p>
            </div>
            <a class="Card-imgTitleWrap" data-tracking-link="https://go.lexipol.com/?target=art_Ph3U2HaSQUe8szQk&amp;source=ads_Ux1D31HYYwXhjsMa&amp;site=policeone" href="/police-products/communications/articles/the-value-of-cellular-broadband-for-mission-critical-communication-white-paper-Ph3U2HaSQUe8szQk/">
             <h3 class="Card-title">
              The value of cellular broadband for mission-critical communication (white paper)
             </h3>
            </a>
            <div class="Card-text">
             <p class="Card-subtitle">
              Findings from a recent survey show that needs for connectivity are outpacing agenciesâ€™ current capabilities as the pandemic accelerates digital transformation
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>

           <div class="Card Card--imgL">

              Ready, set, go! Preparing for 2021 grant opportunities
             </h3>
            </a>
            <div class="Card-text">
             <p class="Card-subtitle">
              Advice on getting your team together for success every step of the way
             </p>

          <div class="Grid-item">
           <div class="Card Card--imgL">
            <a class="Card-imgTitleWrap" data-tracking-link="https://go.lexipol.com/?target=art_dJ7zjCQs8xf7AwUc&amp;source=ads_Ux1D31HYYwXhjsMa&amp;site=policeone" href="/police-products/body-cameras/articles/5-things-to-look-for-in-your-next-body-worn-camera-system-dJ7zjCQs8xf7AwUc/">
             <div class="Card-imgBlock">
              <span class="Picture" style="width:925px;">
               <picture class="Picture-pic" style="padding-top:88.0%;">

            <div class="Card-text">
             <p class="Card-subtitle u-textCaseUpper u-textBold u-textColorSpecial">
              Motorola Solutions
             </p>

            <a class="Card-imgTitleWrap" data-tracking-link="https://go.lexipol.com/?target=art_dJ7zjCQs8xf7AwUc&amp;source=ads_Ux1D31HYYwXhjsMa&amp;site=policeone" href="/police-products/body-cameras/articles/5-things-to-look-for-in-your-next-body-worn-camera-system-dJ7zjCQs8xf7AwUc/">
             <h3 class="Card-title">
              5 things to look for in your next body-worn camera system
             </h3>
            </a>
            <div class="Card-text">
             <p class="Card-subtitle">
              Extended battery life, improved connectivity and the ability to record after the fact are key advantages offered by the WatchGuard V300 bodycam from Motorola Solutions
             </p>

             </h3>

             <h3 class="Card-title">
              Free Grant Assistance for Crime Analysis and Investigation Software
             </h3>
            </a>
            <div class="Card-text">
             <p class="Card-subtitle">

             <div class="Card-imgBlock">
              <span class="Picture" style="width:150px;">

           <div class="Card Card--imgM">
            <a class="Card-imgBlock" href="/company-directory/international-law-enforcement-educators-trainers-association-ileeta/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">

       <div class="Section Section--gapVertSM">
        <a class="TitleBar TitleBar--black is-lazyLoad" href="/officer-down/">
         <h2 class="TitleBar-heading">
          Line Of Duty Deaths
         </h2>
        </a>
        <ul class="List">
         <li class="List-item">
          <div class="HCard HCard--noShifts HCard--dense">
           <a class="HCard-imgTitleWrap" href="/officer-down/calif-border-patrol-agent-killed-while-assisting-with-crash-ruSly2hsZo5nimv9/">
            <h3 class="HCard-title">
             Calif. Border Patrol agent killed while assisting with crash
            </h3>
           </a>
           <div class="HCard-textsWrap">
            <p class="HCard-subtitle">
             Alejandro Flores-BaÃ±uelos
            </p>
            <p class="HCard-copyright">
             [Salton City, California]
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
         </li>
         <li class="List-item">
          <div class="HCard HCard--noShifts HCard--dense">
           <a class="HCard-imgTitleWrap" href="/officer-down/fla-police-officer-dies-after-being-shot-in-2018-standoff-K108Rvnk35c7m3Mz/">
            <h3 class="HCard-title">
             Fla. police officer dies after being shot in 2018 standoff
            </h3>
           </a>
           <div class="HCard-textsWrap">
            <p class="HCard-subtitle">
             Kevin Valencia
            </p>
            <p class="HCard-copyright">
             [Orlando, Florida]
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
         </li>
         <li class="List-item">
          <div class="HCard HCard--noShifts HCard--dense">
           <a class="HCard-imgTitleWrap" href="/officer-down/ill-leo-dies-days-after-suffering-medical-emergency-during-call-XsgUkV1T0PFNK2qp/">
            <h3 class="HCard-title">
             Ill. LEO dies days after suffering medical emergency during call
            </h3>
           </a>
           <div class="HCard-textsWrap">
            <p class="HCard-subtitle">
             Gary Hibbs
            </p>
            <p class="HCard-copyright">
             [Chicago Heights, Illinois]
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
         </li>
        </ul>
        <p class="Section-footer">
         <a class="Link" href="/officer-down/">
          Line Of Duty
          <span class="Link-lastWord">
           Deaths
          </span>
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="Section Section--gapVertSM" id="pollBlock">
       </div>
       <div class="Banner Banner--SM" id="div-gpt-ad-213395177806553216-8">
        <script type="text/javascript">
         googletag.cmd.push(function () { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-213395177806553216-8'); });
        window.lazyAds.renderItemUsingLytcs(8);
        </script>
       </div>
       <div class="Section Section--gapVertSM" id="grants_categories_block">
        <script>
         document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
        var grantsCategoriesBlock = document.getElementById('grants_categories_block');
        if (grantsCategoriesBlock) {
          var request = new XMLHttpRequest();
          var date = new Date().getTime();
          var url = '/grants-categories/?noCacheParam='+date;

          request.open('GET', url, true);
          request.onload = function() {
            if (request.status >= 200 && request.status < 400) {
              grantsCategoriesBlock.innerHTML = request.responseText;
            }
          };
          request.send();
        }
      })
        </script>
       </div>
       <div class="Section Section--gapVertSM">

      <p class="Footer-text">
       Police1 is revolutionizing the way the
       <a class="Footer-link" href="/law-enforcement-directory/">
        law enforcement community
       </a>
       finds relevant news, identifies important
       <a class="Footer-link" href="/police-training/">
        training information
       </a>
       ,
  interacts online and researches
       <a class="Footer-link" href="/columnists/how-to-buy-police-products/">
        product purchases
       </a>
       and
       <a class="Footer-link" href="/company-directory/product-category/">
        manufacturers
       </a>
       .
  It's the most comprehensive and trusted online destination for law enforcement agencies and police departments worldwide.
      </p>

          <picture class="Picture-pic" style="padding-top:98.81%;">

  <div class="Modal fade" data-backdrop="static" id="modal-set-homepage" tabindex="-1">
   <div class="Modal-dialog">
    <p class="Modal-title">
     Make Police1 your homepage
     <a class="Modal-titleIcon" data-dismiss="modal" href="#">
     </a>
    </p>
    <div class="Modal-body">
     <ol class="List List--numbered u-textMedium">
      <li class="List-item">
       Open the tools menu in your browser. This may be called â€œToolsâ€ or use an icon like the cog
       <i class="Icon Icon--cog u-textSizeM2 Icon--sparce u-textGray">
       </i>
       or menu bars
       <i class="Icon Icon--menu u-textSizeM2 Icon--sparce u-textGray">
       </i>
      </li>
      <li class="List-item">
       Select the option or tab named â€œInternet Options (Internet Explorer)â€, â€œOptions (Firefox)â€, â€œPreferences (Safari)â€ or â€œSettings (Chrome)â€.
      </li>
      <li class="List-item">
       Look for a box or option labeled â€œHome Page (Internet Explorer, Firefox, Safari)â€ or â€œOn Startup (Chrome)â€.
      </li>
      <li class="List-item">
       Enter â€œhttps://www.police1.com/â€ and click OK.
      </li>
     </ol>
     <hr class="Modal-hr"/>
     <p class="u-textSmall u-textGray">
      If you need further help setting your homepage, check your browserâ€™s Help menu
     </p>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
 </body>
</html>
